section_about_desc_0: Patients are at the heart of everything we do, and our utmost priority is to promote their well-being and health. We are dedicated to providing the best possible care and support to every individual who seeks our services.
section_about_desc_1: During all these years, we have acquired not only satisfied patients and clients, but also many friends and partners with whom we work together and strive to always improve our business.
section_about_desc_2: Our practice always strives for high-quality physiotherapy and rehabilitation services
home_reviews_quote: "Every movement takes place in time and has a purpose." - Aristotle
home_reviews_description: Whether you have back pain, joint problems, injuries, or post-operative treatments - we have the solution for you with our therapy concept!
content_parallax_description: Physiohilfezug physical medicine and rehabilitation practice is dedicated to providing professional rehabilitation through physical therapy, kinesitherapy and massage and many other therapies and programs. Patients are always our first priority, and their health and providing assistance to them is our most important goal.
content_parallax_p: The office for physical medicine and rehabilitation Physiohilfezug is dedicated to providing professional rehabilitation, our office always strives to provide high-quality physical therapy and rehabilitation services.
content_parallax_p_1: At Physiohilfezug, state-of-the-art equipment is used in a pleasant atmosphere, employing scientifically proven methods for the respective therapy forms. We apply cutting-edge techniques with devices from reputable manufacturers in the treatment of chronic and acute conditions.
content_parallax_p_quality: With its quality and expertise, our team will contribute to your quick recovery, maintenance or improvement of your quality of life. Equipped with professional physical medicine devices, as well as knowledge in the field of kinesitherapy, we will provide you with freedom of movement, without limitations and pain.
content_parallax_p_focus: Our focus is rehabilitation with scientifically proven methods as well as continuous education of our physiotherapists to use the most modern rehabilitation techniques available for all types of injuries and conditions.
content_parallax_p_focus_1: We base our therapy on an individual approach to each patient, in relation to the diagnosis, clinical picture, wishes and needs of the individual, in order to ensure the best therapeutic outcome. Our services include the rehabilitation of injuries, working with athletes and children, treatment of back pain, and various types of massages.
content_parallax_p_mission: Our mission is to meet the needs of the most demanding patients in a pleasant atmosphere, respecting the principles of good clinical practice. Many years of experience, continuous improvement and dedicated work, which distinguish us from others, have contributed to the high reputation of our office both in the country and abroad.
